learning_objective: Design and develop computational artifacts working in team roles using collaborative tools.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex and their team are working on a project to build a financial ledger system for a startup. They are required to divide the task and collaborate on different parts of the project online. Consider the following parts: 1- User Interface, 2- Backend Database, 3- Transaction Processing, 4- Reporting. Which of the following could be a reasonable allocation of roles for the team members?",
    "Answer1": "Alex - Reporting, Chris - User Interface, Sam - Backend Database, Lee - Transaction Processing", 
    "Answer2": "All team members working on User Interface",
    "Answer3": "Alex - User Interface, User Interface - Chris",
    "Answer4": "Alex, Chris, Sam, Lee - Reporting",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "In order to work together effectively, each team member needs a distinct role. Irrespective of how the team decides to allocate roles, it’s important that each essential elements of the project are covered."
}
